column4: how can you bring a network up without using the ifup command?

I have tried that, but in order for dhclient to work properly the network must be up (i.e. I must invoke ifup), if I invoke "ifconfig eth1 up" it doesn't seem to be enough, try "ping whatever" after that and I receive "network is down"
there seems to be something else that ifconfig up and dhclient cannot take care that must be "upped"
